exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.description: A compound exercise that primarily targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps. Performed lying flat on a bench.
instructions: Lie flat on a bench with feet firmly on the ground
Grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder width
Unrack the bar and lower it to mid-chest
Press the bar back up to starting position
Keep your shoulder blades retracted throughout

exercises.name: Barbell Incline Bench Press
exercises.description: An incline pressing movement that emphasizes the upper chest and front deltoids.
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degree incline
Lie back with feet flat on floor
Grip bar slightly wider than shoulders
Lower bar to upper chest
Press back to starting position

exercises.name: Barbell Romanian Deadlift
exercises.description: A hip-hinge movement that targets the posterior chain, primarily hamstrings and glutes.
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart holding barbell
Keep slight bend in knees
Hinge at hips, pushing them back
Lower bar along shins until you feel hamstring stretch
Drive hips forward to return to standing

exercises.name: Barbell Sumo Deadlift
exercises.description: A deadlift variation with wide stance that emphasizes glutes, quads, and adductors.
instructions: Stand with feet wider than shoulder width, toes pointed out
Grip bar with hands inside knees
Keep chest up and back flat
Drive through heels to stand up
Lower bar back down with control

exercises.name: Cable Bicep Curl (Straight Bar)
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for the biceps using constant tension from cable resistance.
instructions: Attach straight bar to low pulley
Stand facing cable with feet shoulder-width apart
Grip bar with underhand grip
Curl bar up toward shoulders
Lower with control to starting position

exercises.name: Cable Pushdown (Straight Bar)
exercises.description: A triceps isolation exercise using a cable machine with constant tension.
instructions: Attach straight bar to high pulley
Stand facing cable, grip bar with overhand grip
Keep elbows tucked to sides
Push bar down until arms are fully extended
Return to starting position with control

exercises.name: Calf Press on Leg Press
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for the calves using the leg press machine.
instructions: Sit in leg press machine
Place balls of feet on lower edge of platform
Extend legs to unlock sled
Lower heels by flexing ankles
Press up through balls of feet to full calf extension

exercises.name: Chest Dip
exercises.description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the chest and triceps with forward lean.
instructions: Grip parallel bars and support body weight
Lean torso forward slightly
Lower body by bending elbows
Descend until shoulders are below elbows
Push back up to starting position

exercises.name: Dumbbell Incline Fly
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for the chest performed on an incline bench.
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degree incline
Lie back holding dumbbells above chest
Keep slight bend in elbows
Lower dumbbells out to sides in arc motion
Bring dumbbells back together above chest

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
exercises.description: A chest pressing exercise using dumbbells for greater range of motion.
instructions: Lie flat on bench holding dumbbells
Start with dumbbells at chest level
Press dumbbells up until arms are extended
Lower dumbbells back to chest level
Keep control throughout movement

exercises.name: Dumbbell Seated Shoulder Press
exercises.description: A shoulder pressing exercise performed seated for stability and isolation.
instructions: Sit on bench with back support
Hold dumbbells at shoulder height
Press dumbbells overhead until arms are extended
Lower dumbbells back to shoulder height
Keep core engaged throughout

exercises.name: EZ Barbell Preacher Curl
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for biceps using a preacher bench to prevent momentum.
instructions: Sit at preacher bench with arms over pad
Grip EZ bar with underhand grip
Curl bar up toward shoulders
Squeeze biceps at top
Lower bar with control to full extension

exercises.name: Hack Squat
exercises.description: A machine-based squat variation that targets quads with back support.
instructions: Position shoulders under pads
Place feet shoulder-width on platform
Release safety handles
Lower body by bending knees
Push through heels to return to starting position

exercises.name: Lat Prayer (Straight Bar)
exercises.description: A lat pulldown variation that targets the lats and upper back.
instructions: Attach straight bar to high pulley
Kneel facing cable machine
Grip bar with overhand grip
Pull bar down toward upper chest
Return to starting position with control

exercises.name: Overhead Extension (Straight Bar)
exercises.description: A triceps isolation exercise using overhead cable extension.
instructions: Attach straight bar to high pulley
Turn away from cable, grip bar overhead
Keep elbows pointed forward
Extend arms forward and up
Return to starting position behind head

exercises.name: Reverse Fly
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for rear deltoids and upper back.
instructions: Sit facing pec deck machine
Grip handles with arms extended forward
Pull handles back in arc motion
Squeeze shoulder blades together
Return to starting position with control

exercises.name: Seated Leg Extension
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for the quadriceps using a leg extension machine.
instructions: Sit in leg extension machine
Position ankles under padded bar
Grip handles for support
Extend legs until fully straight
Lower weight back to starting position

exercises.name: Standing Lateral Raise (Cable)
exercises.description: A shoulder isolation exercise for the lateral deltoids using cable resistance.
instructions: Stand sideways to cable machine
Grip handle with far hand at side
Keep slight bend in elbow
Raise arm out to side to shoulder height
Lower with control to starting position

exercises.name: Barbell Squat
exercises.description: A fundamental compound exercise that targets the entire lower body, primarily quads, glutes, and hamstrings.
instructions: Position barbell across upper back/traps
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Keep chest up and core engaged
Lower by bending knees and hips
Descend until thighs are parallel to ground
Drive through heels to return to standing

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
exercises.description: A unilateral leg exercise that targets quads, glutes, and balance with rear foot elevated.
instructions: Stand facing away from bench
Place rear foot on bench behind you
Hold dumbbells at sides
Lower by bending front knee
Descend until front thigh is parallel to ground
Push through front heel to return to start

exercises.name: Lying Leg Curl
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for the hamstrings performed lying face down on a leg curl machine.
instructions: Lie face down on leg curl machine
Position ankles under padded lever
Grip handles for support
Curl legs up toward glutes
Squeeze hamstrings at top
Lower weight back to starting position with control

exercises.name: Seated Row
exercises.description: A compound pulling exercise that targets the middle back, lats, and biceps.
instructions: Sit at cable row machine with feet on platform
Grip handle with both hands
Keep back straight and chest up
Pull handle to torso, squeezing shoulder blades
Return to starting position with control

exercises.name: Single Arm Row
exercises.description: A unilateral back exercise that targets the lats, rhomboids, and biceps with dumbbells.
instructions: Place one knee and hand on bench for support
Hold dumbbell in opposite hand
Keep back flat and parallel to ground
Pull dumbbell up to hip, leading with elbow
Squeeze back at top
Lower with control to starting position

exercises.name: T-Bar Row
exercises.description: A compound pulling exercise that targets the entire back with emphasis on thickness and mass.
instructions: Straddle T-bar with feet shoulder-width apart
Bend at hips with slight knee bend
Grip handles with both hands
Pull weight toward chest, squeezing shoulder blades
Keep back flat throughout movement
Lower weight with control to starting position
